articles.content:
37th anti-U.S. rally held in S. Korea
    Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- S. Korean organizations reportedly held the 37th anti-U.S. solidarity rally in Seoul on Tuesday. Among them were the people's action for revision of the South Korea-U.S. "status of forces agreement", the all-people measure committee for closure of the U.S. Forces' bombing range in Maehyang-ri and the headquarters of the movement for return of the U.S. military base in Ryongsan.
 Permanent representative Mun Jong Hyon and secretary general Kim Phan Thae of the people's action said that it is the demand of all people to stand against the United States.    
 In a resolution adopted at the rally, the ralliers said that they would keep the spirit of anti-U.S. solidarity rally and carry out such tasks as probe into the truth about the murder of two schoolgirls, opposition to the "National Assembly's" ratification of the "joint land management plan" and the total revision of the unequal "sofa".

South side's delegation here
    Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The south side's delegation with Minister of Unification Jong Se Hyon as chief delegate arrived here today to participate in the 8th inter-Korean ministerial talks.
 The delegation was greeted at the airport by delegates of the north side to the talks.

DPRK delegation returns from China
    Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation led by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, returned home today after winding up its official goodwill visit to China.
 The delegation was met at the airport by secretary of the SPA Presidium Kim Yun Hyok, officials concerned and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe.    
 During its stay, the delegation toured various parts of Beijing and shanghai
